name: AI Song Generator
description: AI Song Generator is a free online tool that uses AI to create custom songs from text prompts or lyrics.
longDescription: AI Song Generator is an innovative platform powered by advanced artificial intelligence to enable users, regardless of musical expertise, to create original, royalty-free songs effortlessly. By inputting text descriptions or custom lyrics, users can generate professional-quality tracks in various genres, such as pop, jazz, or EDM. The website aims to democratize music creation, making it accessible to musicians, content creators, and enthusiasts worldwide. It offers both Simple Mode for quick song generation and Custom Mode for detailed control over musical elements. The platform ensures privacy, with generated songs accessible only to the user, and supports multiple languages for global accessibility. Its mission is to simplify music creation and inspire creativity through AI-driven technology.
features: Simple Mode allows users to generate songs quickly by entering a brief text description, ideal for beginners.
Custom Mode enables detailed control over lyrics, genre, and vocals for personalized song creation.
Generates royalty-free music, allowing use in personal and commercial projects without licensing concerns.
Supports multiple genres, including pop, jazz, EDM, and classical, to match diverse creative visions.
Offers vocal options, including male, female, or instrumental tracks, for flexible music output.
Provides a Song Description Generator to help users craft effective prompts for better results.
Ensures song privacy, keeping generated tracks confidential and accessible only to the creator.
Supports multiple languages, enabling users worldwide to create songs in their native tongue.
Vocal-melody separation technology allows users to isolate vocals or create instrumental versions.
Generates high-quality tracks up to 4 minutes long in under a minute for efficient music production.

faqs.question: Do I need musical experience to use AI Song Generator?
faqs.answer: No musical experience is required; simply provide a text prompt, and the AI generates a song matching your vision.

faqs.question: Is the music generated by AI Song Generator royalty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, all music created is 100% royalty-free, usable for personal and commercial projects without licensing issues.

faqs.question: Can I customize the style or vocals of my song?
faqs.answer: Yes, Custom Mode allows you to choose genres, vocal types (male, female, or instrumental), and other musical elements.

faqs.question: Does the platform support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, AI Song Generator supports song creation in various languages for global accessibility.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a song?
faqs.answer: Songs up to 4 minutes long can be generated in under a minute, depending on the complexity.

faqs.question: Are my generated songs private?
faqs.answer: Yes, all songs are private and accessible only to you, ensuring confidentiality until you choose to share.

faqs.question: What happens if I run out of free credits?
faqs.answer: Free users receive 6 daily credits; additional credits can be purchased, or you can opt for a paid subscription for more.

faqs.question: Can I use the generated songs on platforms like Spotify?
faqs.answer: Yes, with proper attribution for free users or a commercial license for paid subscribers, songs can be distributed on platforms like Spotify.
